ygData.subject: Re: Re: Enchant Series Spells
ygData.msgSnippet: ... We should not get this one as it is a  Shaman special ability. ... made ... normal ... Damage ... from ... to ... LIke Enchanters cant have a high skill at
ygData.messageBody:
>In a message dated 7/24/99 3:56:01 AM Eastern Daylight Time,
>eqenchanters@onelist.com writes:
>
><< Message: 6
> Date: Fri, 23 Jul 1999 10:29:48 -0400 (EDT)
> From: HiFi Review <hifireview@...>
> Subject: Re: Enchanting Item Spells
> These could include, but are not limited to:
>
> (ALCHEMY) (Too recently implemented for me to talk to enough
>Shamans to get a good idea on this one):

We should not get this one as it is a Shaman special ability.
>
>
> (FLETCHING) Enchant Wood Staff:
> A Runed Oak Bow is mentioned in The Official Player's
>Guide, but no Fletcher has the slightest idea of how to get a Bow Staff
made
>into a magical item, and we don't have the ability at this time. The
>resulting completed Bow (with a higher difficulty rating then making a
normal
>bow, of course) could hit for 1-2 more damage or in line with Verant's "any
>altering to a bow decreases Attack Delay and Damage" base, reduce both
Damage
>and Delay Ratings on a completed Bow in addition to any bought materials
from
>merchants. Oak, as the first wood that can be double cammed, would be the
>minimum affected, and Ceramic and Steel Bow Staves need to be implemented
to
>be fair to high skill Fletchers.
>
LIke Enchanters cant have a high skill at fletching?
This skill actually already uses two amgic items to increase the effect and
is a good example of what we might be able to do.
The Planing tool and Whittiling blade could be created by us and a
blacksmith.


> (TINKERING) ?:
> Any Gnomes out there know if this is even implemented
>yet? Or in working order, if so?
>
Works great but we still dont know how to make some items described in the
book :)
www.eqportal.com/tinkering

I cant see Enchanting helping this skill any though. It just would not feel
right to mix them.
